entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 7.5°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: 7.5°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 59 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening with 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low 7. Forecast issued 7:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 in the morning. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 late in the evening then light after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 7:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
